name: rest-apis
description: Full Rest APIs :-  requirement:- 1. npm init -y (create package.json file) 2. npm i express (create your application server) 3. npm i esm (Es package ke help se ES6 ke all module ko use kar skte hai ) 4. npm i nodemon -D (use for developement) 5. npm i dotenv (environment variable ka use karne ke liye) 6.
